attributes.title: Using Love as a Gateway to Higher Consciousness
attributes.description: From the works of Living Enlightened Master Paramahamsa Nithyananda.  This clip is taken from discourse titled, "Love and Merge with Existence".  Swamiji tells us that when you look at a person with lust you always look for what you can get from that person, whereas if you look at a person with love you will always look to see what you can add to that person.  In this clip he gives us a beautiful technique to use love as a gateway to higher consciousness.  With love, a person is a spirit, with lust the person is reduced to an object.  Swamiji sheds light on the meaning of love through various heartwarming small stories. The complete discourse may be ordered online at www.lifeblissgalleria.com.
